<Meta title="Radio" component={Radio} />

# Radio

Radio buttons are a type of input that allow users to select only one option from a list.

## When to Use

A user can only select one option from a list

## When not to Use

A user can select more than one option from a list. In this case, use a checkbox

## API

| Prop  | Type   | Required | Description                     | Default |
| ----- | ------ | -------- | ------------------------------- | ------- |
| id    | string | true     | id of the radio button          |         |
| name  | string | true     | name of the radio button        |         |
| label | string | true     | label text for the radio button |         |

<br />

## Basic

Basic Radio button.

<Story name="Basic" id="radio--basic"></Story>

```bash
<Radio id="radio" name="radio" label="Yes" v-on:radio-select="handleSelect" />

methods: {
  handleSelect() {
    // handle radio button selection here
  }
}
```
